attributes.action: guarantee war widows/war disabled pensioners an increase in their pension of 2.5% to bring them in line with the basic state pension rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Sept inflation may be zero as a result of this the only benefit to be raised will be the basic state pension which is guarenteed a rise of 2.5% .
war widows and war disabled pensioners will receive a zero rise .
many war widows have a reduced state pension on average £35 per week they will therefore receive an increase in pension of 90p yet all others on state pension will receive an increase of £2-50p is this any way to treat our war widows and gallant service men/woman i think not
